violations: Missing PPE: No hard hats or visible gloves
Workers in dangerous positions: Worker leaning inside machinery
Improper equipment usage: Machine left open
Cluttered pathways: Equipment and materials blocking walkways
locations: Right side of image, open machine
recommendations: Ensure all workers wear appropriate PPE including hard hats and gloves.
Prevent workers from leaning into operational machinery; implement safety barriers.
Close machinery when not in active use to prevent accidents.
Clear pathways and organize materials to allow safe movement.

One worker leaning into open machine on the right
Two workers near stacks of materials

worker_identifiers.features: Blue shirt, no helmet, near left machinery
